name: The Isle of Mizu
description:
GENERAL

Spend your time exploring the Isle of Mizu 
and find your missing mother.
You play as a small boy named Koji,
as you progress through the mysterious island,
you'll encounter multiple puzzles
and different yokai that may give you hints
or outright try and eat you. 

Find out what happened to the island
and to your parents as you progress through the game.


Controls  keyboard
Controller
